description: Deletes the resource policy of the S3 Access Grants instance. The resource policy is used to manage cross-account access to your S3 Access Grants instance. By deleting the resource policy, you delete any cross-account permissions to your S3 Access Grants instance. You must have the s3:DeleteAccessGrantsInstanceResourcePolicy permission to use this operation.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the S3 Access Grants instance.
